question: Prime Minister Narendra Modi released the biography of which personality, titled ‘Deh Vechava Karani’?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi has recently released the biography of late Member of Parliament Dr Balasaheb Vikhe Patil.
The autobiography is titled ‘Deh Vechava Karani’ which means dedicating one’s life for a noble cause. He served as the Member of Parliament for seven times. He was awarded the prestigious Padma Bhushan award in 2010 for his contribution in the field of Social Work.
